hero.description: Front-End Developer with over 3 years of experience building complex enterprise systems. Specialized in Vue.js, TypeScript and modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Front-End Developer with over 3 years of experience building complex enterprise systems for public and private institutions. Expertise in modern technologies like Svelte, Vue.js and TypeScript. Recognized for consistently delivering functional, collaborative and scalable modules.

goals.shortTerm: Short Term: Advance from semi-senior to senior level, strengthen my technical English and add value to impactful projects.
goals.longTerm: Long Term: Work abroad, master emerging technologies like artificial intelligence and specialize in backend microservices.

item1.description: Sole Front-End responsible for the SICOJ system's Consultations module at SAT. Developed with Svelte, TypeScript and Redux, recognized for delivering the project's most advanced module.

item2.description: Development for MI4P client (USA and Canada), building reactive interfaces with Razor and Vue.js, automated testing with Selenium and development of the ShoppingCart system.

item3.description: .NET 6 MVC view design with jQuery and Bootstrap. Created WordPress sites and managed version control in GitHub under Scrum methodology.

item4.company: Tecnológico de Estudios Superiores de Ecatepec
item4.description: Graduated with professional license. Strong background in software development, databases and development methodologies.
